main event: A bright light leaving a long blue trail was sighted, possibly a missile or other object travelling at high speed.
interesting points: The object was in level flight for about 10 seconds.,The sighting was reported by pilots on board a tanker-transport.,There was no detonation or explosion observed.,The object was lost to sight due to distance and time lag.,The light did not resemble a shooting star or meteor.
sighted object: a bright light with a long blue trail
